example.text: I am proud to have cosponsored a resolution that reaffirms your right to private property and freedom. Socialism and communism have led to the destruction of nations like Venezuela and the Soviet Union- impoverishing and even murdering tens of millions of their citizens.

Pictured above - Governor Hochul (Left) shakes hands with Congressman Williams (Right) at a bipartisan meeting of New York State Republican and Democratic members On Thursday, Governor Kathy Hochul and I had a productive meeting discussing ways we can work together to better Central New York and the Mohawk Valley. From the historic Micron Technology investment to lowering energy costs, my office is making every effort to find opportunities to cooperate to serve the people of CNY and the Mohawk Valley.
